mapper.select:
select t.* from (select n.hotelno, n.hotelFileName,rh.realhotelname, r.grade,r.reviewContent, r.reviewDate from hotel n,review r,realhotel rh
where n.hotelNo=r.hotelNo and n.realhotelno = rh.realhotelno order by r.grade desc) t where rownum<5
select n.hotelNo, i.hotelFileName, n.hotelName, n.mainAddress, n.address from hotel_image i, hotel n where i.hotelNo = n.hotelNo

select a.hotelno, realhotelName, hotelFilename, state, roomPrice, ag, buffet, swim from ( select hotelno, round(avg(grade),1) as ag from review group by hotelno ) a, ( select rownum rn, h.hotelno, state, hotelFilename, realhotelname, roomPrice, buffet, swim from hotel h, realhotel r, hotel_room hr where h.realhotelno = r.realhotelno and h.hotelno = hr.hotelno ) b where a.hotelno = b.hotelno
and state like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select count(*) from hotel where hotelNo > 0
and title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select m.memberno, m.memberid, m.membername,m.membernickname, r.reviewno, l.realhotelname, l.state, r.reviewcontent, r.reviewDate , h.hotelFilename, s.userAmount, s.checkInDate, s.checkOutDate from hotel h, realhotel l, member m, review r, reservation s where h.realhotelno = l.realhotelno and r.hotelno = h.hotelno and h.hotelno = s.roomno and m.memberno = r.memberno and s.memberno = r.memberno and m.memberno = 1
